## Systems




### space

```js
import { space } from 'pss'
```

Consistent `space` system for setting `margin`, or `padding`. Created with [spaceValue][168].

**Component props:**

-   `mg` â†’ `margin`
-   `mgl` â†’ `margin-left`
-   `mgr` â†’ `margin-right`
-   `mgt` â†’ `margin-top`
-   `mgb` â†’ `margin-bottom`
-   `mgx` â†’ `margin-left`, `margin-right`
-   `mgy` â†’ `margin-top`, `margin-bottom`
-   `pd` â†’ `padding`
-   `pdl` â†’ `padding-left`
-   `pdr` â†’ `padding-right`
-   `pdt` â†’ `padding-top`
-   `pdb` â†’ `padding-bottom`
-   `pdx` â†’ `padding-left`, `padding-right`
-   `pdy` â†’ `padding-top`, `padding-bottom`

**`Number` values:**

-   Value from `theme.space[mediaKey]`, `theme.space.all` or `theme.space` `Array` by index
-   Negative value for negative margins

**`String` values:**

Treated same way as in [size][189].

-   Get value by path in `theme.size` or in top level `theme` object
-   If value in `theme.sizes` is an `Object` with media keys (like in `theme.media`) value is responsive
-   Other `String` values is passed as raw CSS value (like `'10%'` or `'100vh'`).

Related: [spaceValue][168], [sizes][5].

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { space } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${space}
`
```

```js
const theme = {
  media: { sm: '(max-width: 600px)' },
  space: [ 0, 8, 16, 32, 65 ]
}

// `theme.space[1]`
<Box mg={1} /> // â†’ margin: 8px;
<Box mgl={1} /> // â†’ margin-left: 8px;

// `theme.space[2]`
<Box mgy={2} /> // â†’ margin-top: 16px; margin-bottom: 16px;
<Box mg={-2} /> // â†’ margin: -16px;

// `theme.space[0]`
<Box mg={0} /> // â†’ margin: 0;

// Responsive
<Box mgr={{ sm: -1 }} /> // â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-right: -8px }
<Box mgr={{ all: 2, sm: -1 }} /> // â†’ margin-right: 16px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-right: -8px }

// Custom values
<Box mgx='auto' /> // â†’ margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto
<Box mgy='100px' /> // â†’ margin-top: 100px; margin-bootom: 100px
```

```js
const theme = {
  media: {
    sm: '(max-width: 600px)'
  },
  space: {
    all: [ 0, 10, 20, 40, 80 ],
    sm: [ 0, 8, 16, 32, 64 ],
  }
}

// `theme.space.all[1]` and `theme.space.sm[1]`
<Box mg={1} /> // â†’ margin: 10px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin: 8px }
<Box mgl={1} /> // â†’ margin-left: 10px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-left: 8px }

// `theme.space.all[2]` and `theme.space.sm[2]`
<Box mgy={2} /> // â†’ margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-top: 16px; margin-bottom: 16px }
<Box mg={-2} /> // â†’ margin: -20px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin: -16px; }

// `theme.space.all[0]` and `theme.space.sm[0]`
<Box mg={0} /> // â†’ margin: 0; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin: 0 }

// Responsive
<Box mgr={{ sm: -1 }} /> // â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-right: -8px }
<Box mgr={{ all: 2, sm: -1 }} /> // â†’ margin-right: 20px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-right: -8px }
```

### sizes

```js
import { sizes } from 'pss'
```

Consistent `sizes` system for `width`, `height`. Created with [sizeValue][163].

**Component props:**

-   `width` â†’ `width`
-   `maxWidth` â†’ `max-width`
-   `minWidth` â†’ `min-width`
-   `height` â†’ `height`
-   `maxHeight` â†’ `max-height`
-   `minHeight` â†’ `min-height`

**`String` values:**

-   Get value by path in `theme.size` or in top level `theme` object
-   If value in `theme.sizes` is an `Object` with media keys (like in `theme.media`) value is responsive
-   Other `String` values is passed as raw CSS value (like `'10%'` or `'100vh'`).

**`Number` values:**

-   From 0-1 it is converted to percentage widths
-   Greater than 1 are converted to pixel values.

Related: [sizeValue][163], [space][2].

Examples use this `theme`:

```js
const theme = {
  media: {
    sm: `(max-width: 600px)`
  },
  size: {
    small: '10px',
    medium: '20px',
    card: {
      all: '500px',
      sm: '300px'
    }
  }
}
```

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { sizes } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${sizes}
`
```

```js
// `theme.size.small`
<Box height='small' /> // â†’ height: 10px

// `theme.size.card.default` and `theme.size.card.sm`
<Box width='card' /> // â†’ width: 500px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-left: 300px }

// only `theme.size.card.sm`
<Box width={{ sm: 'card' }} /> // â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-left: 300px }

// Numbers smaller that or equal to `1` is percentage value
<Box maxWidth={(1 / 2)} /> // â†’ max-width: 50%
<Box width={1} /> // â†’ width: 100%

// Convert numbers bigger that `1` to px
<Box minWidth={500} /> // â†’ min-width: 500px

// Literal string values
<Box minHeight='1px' /> // â†’ max-height: 1px
```

### colors

```js
import { colors } from 'pss'
```

Prop styles for getting current `palette` or `color` value from `theme`. Created with [colorValue][171].

Result can be changed in nested components with setting other key in `theme.default.palette`.

**Component props:**

-   `fg` â†’ `color`
-   `bg` â†’ `background-color`
-   `tm` â†’ `color`, `background-color`

**`String` values:**

-   Valid color: `#f00`, `rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.2)`, `hsl(0, 100%, 50%)`
-   Key in `theme.color` or `theme.palette[theme.default.palette]`
    -   `black` â†’ `theme.color.black`
    -   `accent` â†’ `theme.palette.default.accent`

**`Boolean` values:**

-   `true` is different in each prop (takes specified value in `theme.palette[theme.default.palette]`)
    -   `bg` â†’ `theme.palette.default.bg`
    -   `fg` â†’ `theme.palette.default.fg`
    -   `tm` â†’ `theme.palette.default.fg`, `theme.palette.default.bg`

Related: [colorValue][171], [rule][157].

Examples use this `theme`:

```js
const theme = {
  default: {
    palette: 'default' // this can be changed
  },
  color: {
    red: '#ff0000',
    black: '#222222',
    white: '#ffffff'
  },
  palette: {
    default: { // currently active
      bg: '#ffffff',
      fg: '#222222',
      accent: '#ff0000'
    },
    inverted: {
      bg: '#222222',
      fg: '#ffffff',
      accent: '#ff0000'
    }
  }
}
```

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { colors } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${colors}
`
```

```js
// theme.palette.default.bg
<Box bg /> // background-color: #ffffff

// theme.colors.black
<Box fg='black' /> // color: #222222

// theme.palette.default.accent
<Box fg='accent' /> // color: #ff0000

// theme.palette.default.bg, theme.palette.default.fg
<Box tm /> // background-color: #ffffff; color: #222222

// theme.palette.inverted.bg, theme.palette.inverted.fg
<Box tm='inverted' /> // background-color: #222222; color: #fffffff

// Valid color value
<Box bg="#ffff00" /> // background-color: #ffff00
```

### box

```js
import { box } from 'pss'
```

Combination of

-   [borders][27]
-   [borderColor][30]
-   [borderRadius][33]
-   [boxSelfAlignment][42]
-   [boxShadow][45]
-   [colors][8]
-   [flex][54]
-   [order][88]
-   [outline][91]
-   [overflow][94]
-   [sizes][5]
-   [space][2]

Related: [boxStyle][14], [combineStyles][141].

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { box } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.p`
  ${box}
`
```

```js
<Box mgx='auto' /> // â†’ marginLeft: auto; marginRight: auto
<Box flex='1 1 0' /> // â†’ flex: 1 1 0
<Box width={1 / 2} /> // â†’ width: 50%
```

### boxStyle

```js
import { boxStyle } from 'pss'
```

Global box styles system, like in [Sketch][191].

Related: [variant][183].

Add `boxStyle` to `theme`:

```js
const theme = {
  boxStyle: {
    red: {
      backgroundColor: 'red',
      color: 'white'
    },
    shadow: {
      boxShadow: '0 0 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .3)'
    }
  }
}
```

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { boxStyle } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${boxStyle}
`
```

```js
<Box boxStyle='red' /> // â†’ background-color: red; color: white;
<Box boxStyle={[ 'red', 'shadow' ]} /> // â†’ background-color: red; color: white; box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .3);
```

```js
const Box = styled.div`
  ${boxStyle.variant}
`

<Box variant='red' /> // â†’ background-color: red; color: white;
<Box variant={[ 'red', 'shadow' ]} /> // â†’ background-color: red; color: white; box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(0, 0,
```

```js
<Text textAlign='center' /> // text-align: center
<Text lineHeight='normal' /> // line-height: normal
```

### textStyle

```js
import { textStyle } from 'pss'
```

Global text styles system, like in [Sketch][192].

Related: [variant][183], [text][17].

Add `textStyle` to `theme`:

```js
const theme = {
  textStyle: {
    default: {
      fontSize: '16px',
      lineHeight: 1.2,
      fontWeight: 'normal',
      fontFamily: 'system-ui'
    },
    heading: {
      fontSize: '2rem',
      lineHeight: 1.2,
      fontWeight: 'bold',
      fontFamily: 'system-ui'
    }
  }
}
```

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { textStyle } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${textStyle}
`
```

```js
<Box textStyle={true} /> // â†’ `theme.textStyle.default`
<Box textStyle='heading' /> // â†’ `theme.textStyle.heading`
```

```js
const Text = styled.div`
  ${textStyle.variant}
`

<Text variant={true} /> // â†’ `theme.textStyle.default`
<Text variant='heading' /> // â†’ `theme.textStyle.heading`
```

## Styles




### backgroundColor

```js
import { backgroundColor } from 'pss'
```

| prop              | css               | type                | value | theme              | true           | false |
| :---------------- | :---------------- | :------------------ | :---- | :----------------- | :------------- | :---- |
| `backgroundColor` | `backgroundColor` | `String`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `color`, `palette` | `palette.*.bg` | â€”     |

Related: [textColor][109], [colors][8], [style][186], [colorValue][171].

Examples use this `theme`:

```js
const theme = {
  default: {
    palette: 'default' // this can be changed in runtime and default to `default`
  },
  color: {
    red: '#ff0000',
    black: '#222222',
    white: '#ffffff'
  },
  palette: {
    default: { // currently active
      bg: '#000000',
      accent: '#ff0000'
    },
    inverted: {
      bg: '#ffffff',
      accent: '#ff0000'
    }
  }
}
```

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { backgroundColor } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${backgroundColor}
`
```

```js
// theme.colors.black
<Box color='black' /> // color: #222222

// theme.palette.default.accent
<Box color='accent' /> // color: #ff0000

// theme.palette.default.bg
<Box color /> // color: #000000

// Valid color value
<Box color="#ffff00" /> // background-color: #ffff00
```

### borders

```js
import { borders } from 'pss'
```

Set borders with values from theme.

| prop           | css             | type                          | value | true                   | false |
| :------------- | :-------------- | :---------------------------- | :---- | :--------------------- | :---- |
| `border`       | `border`        | `String`, `theme.border[key]` | âœ“     | `theme.border.default` | â€”     |
| `borderLeft`   | `border-left`   | `String`, `theme.border[key]` | âœ“     | `theme.border.default` | â€”     |
| `borderRight`  | `border-right`  | `String`, `theme.border[key]` | âœ“     | `theme.border.default` | â€”     |
| `borderTop`    | `border-top`    | `String`, `theme.border[key]` | âœ“     | `theme.border.default` | â€”     |
| `borderBottom` | `border-bottom` | `String`, `theme.border[key]` | âœ“     | `theme.border.default` | â€”     |

Related: [themeValue][174], [rule][157],

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { borders } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${borders}
`
```

```js
<Box border='1px dotted red' /> // border: 1px dotted red;
<Box borderBottom='divider' /> // border-bottom: 1px dotted #f5f5f5;
```

### borderColor

```js
import { borderColor } from 'pss'
```

| prop          | css            | type                | value | true                           | false |
| :------------ | :------------- | :------------------ | :---- | :----------------------------- | :---- |
| `borderColor` | `border-color` | `String`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `theme.palette.default.border` | â€”     |

Related: [colorValue][171], [style][186],

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { borders, borderColor } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${borders}
  ${borderColor}
`
```

```js
<Box borderBottom='thick' borderColor='red' /> // border-left: 3px solid; border-color: red
```

### boxContentAlignment

| prop             | css               | type     | value | true | false |

```js
import { boxContentAlignment } from 'pss'

  display: grid;

`
```

    <Grid alignContent='center'>
      <div>1</div>
      <div>2</div>
    </Grid>

### boxShadow

```js
import { boxShadow } from 'pss'
```

| prop        | css          | type     | value | true                      | false |
| :---------- | :----------- | :------- | :---- | :------------------------ | :---- |
| `boxShadow` | `box-shadow` | `String` | âœ“     | `theme.boxShadow.default` | â€”     |

Related: [box][11], [style][186], [themeValue][174].

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { boxShadow } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.p`
  ${boxShadow}
`
```

```js
<Box boxShadow='0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)' /> // â†’ box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)
<Box boxShadow={true} /> // â†’ theme.boxShadow.default
<Box boxShadow='elevate-100' /> // â†’ theme.boxShadow['elevate-100']
```

### fontFamily

```js
import { fontFamily } from 'pss'
```

Set `font-family` from `theme`:

```js
const theme = {
  default: {
    fontFamily: 'ui'
  },
  fontFamily: {
    heading: 'Times',
    ui: 'Helvetica'
  }
}
```

Related: [style][186].

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { fontFamily } from 'pss'

const Text = styled.p`
  ${fontFamily}
`
```

```js
<Text fontFamily={true} /> // â†’ font-family: Helvetica
<Text fontFamily='ui' /> // â†’ font-family: Helvetica
<Text fontFamily='heading' /> // â†’ font-family: Times
<Text fontFamily='Comic Sans' /> // â†’ font-family: Comic Sans
```

| prop       | css         | type               | theme      | value | true | false |
| :--------- | :---------- | :----------------- | :--------- | :---- | :--- | :---- |

Related: [text][17], [ellipsis][194], [rule][157].

```js
const theme = {
  default: {
    fontSize: 'root'
  },
  media: {
    sm: '(max-width: 600px)'
  },
  fontSize: {
    root: 16,
    heading: 22,
    caption: {
      all: 12,
      sm: 14
    }
  }
}
```


### gap

```js
import { gap } from 'pss'
```

Same as [space][2], but for [grid][71] and [flex][54].

**Component props:**

-   `gap` â†’ `grid-gap`, `gap`
-   `columnGap` â†’ `grid-column-gap`, `column-gap`
-   `rowGap` â†’ `grid-row-gap`, `row-gap`

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { gap } from 'pss'

const Grid = styled.div`
  display: grid;
  ${gap}
`
```

    <Grid gap={1}> // grid-gap: 8px; gap: 8px
     <div>1</div>
     <div>2</div>
    </Grid>

```js
// â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { display: none }
// â†’ @media (min-width: 601px) and (max-width: 1024px) { display: none }
```

```css
  margin-left: -1px;

  height: 0;
```

### textColor

```js
import { textColor } from 'pss'
```

| prop    | css     | type                | value | theme              | true           | false |
| :------ | :------ | :------------------ | :---- | :----------------- | :------------- | :---- |
| `color` | `color` | `String`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `color`, `palette` | `palette.*.fg` | â€”     |

Related: [backgroundColor][24], [colors][8], [style][186], [colorValue][171].

Examples use this `theme`:

```js
const theme = {
  default: {
    palette: 'default' // this can be changed in runtime and default to `default`
  },
  color: {
    red: '#ff0000',
    black: '#222222',
    white: '#ffffff'
  },
  palette: {
    default: { // currently active
      fg: '#000000',
      accent: '#ff0000'
    },
    inverted: {
      fg: '#ffffff',
      accent: '#ff0000'
    }
  }
}
```

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { textColor } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${textColor}
`
```

```js
// theme.colors.black
<Box color='black' /> // color: #222222

// theme.palette.default.accent
<Box color='accent' /> // color: #ff0000

// theme.palette.default.fg
<Box color /> // color: #000000

// Valid color value
<Box color="#ffff00" /> // background-color: #ffff00
```

### atomic

```js
import { atomic } from 'pss'
```

First version of `pss` is different, most of the styles applied with short flags.
Now this variants considered as bad practice as it introduce new syntax to rembember.
But sometimes it can be useful to have short variants and can speed-up development process.

| prop   | css             | type                          | value | theme    | true       | false    |
| :----- | :-------------- | :---------------------------- | :---- | :------- | :--------- | :------- |
| `d`    | `display`       | `String`, `Boolean`           | âœ“     | â€”        | `initial`  | `none`   |
| `f`    | `flex`          | `String`                      | âœ“     | â€”        | â€”          | â€”        |
| `o`    | `order`         | `String`                      | âœ“     | â€”        | â€”          | â€”        |
| `prl`  | `position`      | `String`, `Boolean`           | âœ“     | `media`  | `relative` | â€”        |
| `pab`  | `position`      | `String`, `Boolean`           | âœ“     | `media`  | `absolute` | â€”        |
| `pfx`  | `position`      | `String`, `Boolean`           | âœ“     | `media`  | `fixed`    | â€”        |
| `psy`  | `position`      | `String`, `Boolean`           | âœ“     | `media`  | `sticky`   | â€”        |
| `pst`  | `position`      | `String`, `Boolean`           | âœ“     | `media`  | `static`   | â€”        |
| `l`    | `left`          | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `0`        | â€”        |
| `r`    | `right`         | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `0`        | â€”        |
| `t`    | `top`           | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `0`        | â€”        |
| `b`    | `bottom`        | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `0`        | â€”        |
| `x`    | `left`, `right` | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `0`        | â€”        |
| `y`    | `top`, `bottom` | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `0`        | â€”        |
| `z`    | `z-index`       | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `zIndex` | `1`        | `auto`   |
| `w`    | `width`         | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `100%`     | â€”        |
| `h`    | `height`        | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `100%`     | â€”        |
| `minw` | `min-width`     | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `100%`     | â€”        |
| `minh` | `min-height`    | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `100%`     | â€”        |
| `maxw` | `max-width`     | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `100%`     | â€”        |
| `maxh` | `max-height`    | `String`, `Number`, `Boolean` | âœ“     | `sizes`  | `100%`     | â€”        |
| `ov`   | [overflow][94]  | `String`, `Boolean`           | âœ“     | â€”        | `auto`     | `hidden` |

Related [space][2], [colors][8], [hide][76].

#### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { atomic } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  ${atomic}
`
```

```js
<Box d='inline-block' /> // â†’ display: inline-block;
```

    <Box d='flex'> // â†’ display: inline-block;
      <Box f='1' o='1'> // â†’ flex: 1; order: 1
         Second
      </Box>
      <Box>
       First
      </Box>
    </Box>

```js
<Box w h /> // â†’ width: 100%; height: 100%;
<Box minw={1 / 4} /> // â†’ min-width: 25%
```

```js
<Box prl /> // â†’ position: relative;
<Box pab='sm' /> // â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { position: absolute; }
```

```js
<Box t={0.2} l={0} /> // â†’ position: absolute; top: 20%; left: 0
<Box x y /> // â†’ position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
```

```js
<Box ov='auto touch' /> // â†’ overflow: auto; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch
```

## Mixins




### themePath

```js
import { themePath } from 'pss'
```

Get value from theme.

#### Parameters

-   `input`  
-   `defaultValue`  

#### Examples

```js
import { themePath } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  width: ${themePath('size.card')};
  background-color: ${themePath('color.red', 'hotpink')};
`

<Box /> // â†’ width: 200px; background-color: hotpink;
```

### mq

```js
import { mq } from 'pss'
```

#### Parameters

-   `mediaKey`  â€” key in `theme.media`
-   `fallback`   (optional, default `'all'`)

#### Examples

```js
import { mq, themePath } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
  @media ${mq('sm')} {
    background-color: ${themePath('color.red', 'hotpink')};
  }
`

<Box /> // â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { background-color: red; }
```

### prop

```js
import { prop } from 'pss'
```

#### Parameters

-   `key`  
-   `fallback`  

#### Examples

```js
import { prop, themePath, mq } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div`
 background-color: ${prop('bg')};
 color: ${prop('color', themePath('color.primary'))};
 border-color: ${prop('borderColor', 'black')};
 width: ${prop('width', '100%')};

 @media ${mq('sm')} {
   width: ${prop('width.sm'};
 }
`

<Box bg='red' /> // â†’ background-color: red; color: #0000FF; border-color: black;
<Box color='blue' /> // â†’ color: blue; border-color: black;
```

## Utils




### combineStyles

Combine multiple styles together

#### Parameters

-   `fns` **...any** 

#### Examples

```js
import { combineStyles } from 'pss'
```

```js
import { combineStyles, margin, padding } from 'pss'

const space = combineStyles(
  margin,
  padding
)

const Space = styled.div`
  ${space}
`

Space.propTypes = {
  ...space.propTypes
}
```

### rem

Convert number to rem

#### Parameters

-   `input`   (optional, default `16`)
-   `base`   (optional, default `16`)

#### Examples

```js
import { rem } form 'pss'

rem() // â†’ 1rem
rem(16) // â†’ 1rem
rem(20) // â†’ 1.25rem
rem('20px') // â†’ 1.25rem
rem(20, 20) // â†’ 1rem
```

### px

Convert numbers to pixels

#### Parameters

-   `num`  

#### Examples

```js
import { px } from 'pss'

px(30) // â†’ '30px'
px(0) // â†’ 0
px('100px') // â†’ '100px'
px('100rem') // â†’ '100rem' (nothing changed)
```

### splitUnit

#### Parameters

-   `input`  

#### Examples

```js
import { splitUnit } from 'pss'

const [ value, unit ] = splitUnit('30px') // â†’ [ 30, 'px' ]
```

## Custom Styles




### createStyles

```js
import pss from 'pss'
import { createStyles } from 'pss'
```

Create styles from [Object][198] with keys that represents component `prop` and
the value is a `style` that will be applied.

```js
{ [prop]: style | (input, props, mediaKey) => style }
```

-   `input` - prop value
-   `props` [Object][198] - component props, including `theme`
-   `mediaKey` [Object][198] - key in `theme.media`

In component prop accepts values:

-   [Boolean][199] â€” enable / disable simple styles or default [variant][183]

    ```js
    const Comp = styled.div(createStyles({ red: { color: 'red' } }))

    <Comp red={true} /> // â†’ color: red
    <Comp red={false} /> // â†’ ðŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸
    ```

-   [Boolean][199], [String][200], [Number][201] â€” handled in functional styles

    ```js
    const Comp = styled.div(createStyles({ width: (input) => ({ width: input } })))

    <Comp width='100px' /> // â†’ width: 100px
    ```

-   [Object][198] with keys defined in `theme.media` to define values for different screen sizes

    ```js
    <Comp width={{ all: '100px', sm: '50px' }} /> // â†’ width: 100px; @media (max-width: 600px) { width: 50px }
    ```

#### Parameters

-   `stylesMap` **[Object][190]** 

#### Examples

```js
import { createStyles } from 'pss'

const styles = createStyles({
  display: value => ({ display: value }),
  hide: { display: 'none' },
  width: (value, props, mediaKey) => ({
    width: mediaKey === 'sm' && value === true ? '100%' : value
  })
})

const Box = styled.div`
  ${styles}
`

Box.propTypes = {
  ...styles.propTypes
}
```

```js
<Box display='inline-flex' /> // â†’ display: inline-flex
<Box hide /> // â†’ display: none
```

```js
// Add media queries
const theme = {
  media: {
    sm: '(max-width: 600px)'
  }
}

<Box theme={theme} width={{ all: '100px', sm: true }} /> // â†’ width: 100px; @media (max-width: 600px) { width: 100% }

<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Box display='flex' hide={{ sm: true }} /> // â†’ display: flex; @media (max-width: 600px) { display: none }
</ThemeProvider>
```

Returns **[Function][202]** `(props) => styles`

### rule

```js
import { rule } from 'pss'
```

Create style rule. Must be used with [createStyles][154].

#### Parameters

-   `cssProp` **[string][203]** 
-   `getValue`  
-   `value` **[Function][202]**  (optional, default `identity`)

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { rule } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div(pss({
  display: rule('display')
}))
```

```js
// Add theme to ThemeProvider
<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Box display='flex' /> // â†’ display: flex
</ThemeProvider>
```

Returns **[Function][202]** 

### boolValue

```js
import { boolValue } from 'pss'
```

Get value for rule based boolean condition, other values passed without modification.
Must be used with [rule][157].

#### Parameters

-   `trueValue`  
-   `falseValue`  
-   `defaultValue`  

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { rule, boolValue } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div(pss({
  opacity: rule('opacity', boolValue(1, 0))
}))
```

```js
<Box opacity={true} /> // â†’ opacity: 1
<Box opacity={false} /> // â†’ opacity: 0
<Box opacity={0.5} /> // â†’ opacity: 0.5
```

### sizeValue

```js
import { sizeValue } from 'pss'
```

Sizes system for any css prop. Default behaviour described in [sizes][5].
Must be used with [rule][157].

Related: [sizes][5], [rule][157], [spaceValue][168].

#### Parameters

-   `defaultValue` **[Function][202]?** 

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { rule, sizeValue, boolValue } from 'pss'

const sizes = pss({
  h: rule('height', sizeValue())
  w: rule('width', sizeValue()),
  l: rule('left', sizeValue(boolValue(0))),
  r: rule('right', sizeValue(boolValue(0)))
})

const Box = styled.div`
  ${sizes}
`
```

```js
<Box w={0} /> // â†’ width: 0
<Box h='300px' /> // â†’ height: 300px
<Box l={{ all: 0, sm: 'auto' }} /> // â†’ left: 0; @media (max-width: 600px) { left: auto }
<Box l={20} r={10} /> // â†’ left: 20px; right: 10px
<Box l r /> // â†’ left: 0; right: 0
```

Returns **[Function][202]** that must be used in [rule][157]

### percentageValue

```js
import { percentageValue } from 'pss'
```

Related: [sizes][5], [rule][157], [sizeValue][163].

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { rule, percentageValue } from 'pss'

const sizes = pss({
  w: rule('width', percentageValue())
})

const Box = styled.div`
  ${sizes}
`
```

```js
<Box w={1} /> // â†’ width: 100%
<Box w={1 / 2} /> // â†’ width: 50%
<Box w={0} /> // â†’ width: 0
<Box w={100} /> // â†’ width: 100px
```

Returns **[Function][202]** that must be used in [rule][157]

### spaceValue

```js
import { spaceValue } from 'pss'
```

Spacing system for `margin`, `padding`. Default behaviour described in [space][2].
Must be used with [rule][157].

Related: [space][2], [sizes][5], [rule][157], [sizeValue][163].

#### Parameters

-   `defaultValue`  â€” Fallback value used when prop value is [String][200] or nothing returned. (optional, default `sizeValue(identity)`)

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { rule, spaceValue } from 'pss'

const spaceRule = (name) => rule(name, spaceValue())

const margin = pss({
  mg: spaceRule('margin'),
  mgl: spaceRule('marginLeft'),
  mgr: spaceRule('marginRight'),
  mgt: spaceRule('marginTop'),
  mgb: spaceRule('marginBottom'),
  mgx: [ spaceRule('marginLeft'), spaceRule('marginRight') ],
  mgy: [ spaceRule('marginTop'), spaceRule('marginBottom') ]
})

const Box = styled.div`
  ${margin}
`
```

```js
const theme = {
  media: {
    sm: '(max-width: 600px)' // optional
  },
  space: [ 0, 8, 16, 32, 64 ]
}

<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Box mg={1} /> // â†’ margin: 8px;
  <Box mgx={2} /> // â†’ margin-left: 16px; margin-right: 16px
  <Box mg={{ sm: 1 }} /> // â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { margin: 8px }
</ThemeProvider>
```

```js
const theme = {
  media: {
    sm: '(max-width: 600px)'
  },
  space: {
    all: [ 0, 8, 16, 32, 64 ],
    sm: [ 0, 4, 8, 16, 32 ]
  }
}

<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Box mg={1} /> // â†’ margin: 8px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin: 4px }
  <Box mgx={2} /> // â†’ margin-left: 16px; margin-right: 16px; @media (max-width: 600px) { margin-left: 8px; margin-right: 8px; }
  <Box mg={{ sm: 1 }} /> // â†’ @media (max-width: 600px) { margin: 4px }
</ThemeProvider>
```

Returns **[Function][202]** that must be used in [rule][157]

### colorValue

```js
import { colorValue } from 'pss'
```

Get color from theme and apply it to css prop. Must be used with [rule][157].

#### Parameters

-   `key` **[string][203]** â€” Key in `theme.color` or in `theme.palette[theme.default.palette]`
-   `transformValue` **[Function][202]** â€” Return customized CSS prop value (i.e. `box-shadow`, gradients) (optional, default `identity`)

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { rule, colorValue } from 'pss'

const colors = pss({
  fg: rule('color', colorValue('fg')),
  bg: rule('backgroundColor', colorValue('bg')),
  shadow: rule('boxShadow', colorValue('shadow', (color) => `0 0 20px 0 ${color}`)),
  tm: [
     rule('color', colorValue('fg')),
     rule('backgroundColor', colorValue('bg'))
  ]
})

// Add to component
const Box = styled.div`
  ${colors}
`
```

```js
// theme.palette.default.fg
<Box fg={true} /> // background-color: #222222

// theme.colors.black
<Box fg='black' /> // color: #222222

// theme.palette.default.accent
<Box fg='accent' /> // color: #ff0000

// theme.palette.default.shadow
<Box shadow={true} /> // box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)

// theme.palette.default.fg, theme.palette.default.bg
<Box tm='default' /> // color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff
```

Returns **[Function][202]** 

### themeValue

```js
import { themeValue } from 'pss'
```

Use values defined in `theme[themeKey]`.

See [fontFamily][59], [radius][204].

#### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][190]**  (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `options.themeKey`  
    -   `options.transformValue`   (optional, default `identity`)
    -   `options.keyword`   (optional, default `true`)
    -   `options.fallback`  
    -   `options.scale`   (optional, default `{}`)

#### Examples

```js
const theme = {
  font: {
    heading: 'Times New Roman, serif',
    ui: 'system-ui, Helvetica, sans-serif'
  }
}
```

```js
import pss, { themeValue } from 'pss'

const Text = styled.div(pss({
  fontFamily: rule('fontFamily', themeValue({ themeKey: 'font' }))
}))

<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Text fontFamily='ui'>
    Hello World!
  </Text>
</ThemeProvider>
```

```css
.css {
  font-family: system-ui, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}
```

Returns **[Function][202]** 

### mediaStyle

```js
import { mediaStyle } from 'pss'
```

Create style wrapped in `theme.media`.

Related: [display][51].

#### Parameters

-   `style`  

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { mediaStyle } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div(pss({
  hide: mediaStyle({ display: 'none' })
}))
```

```js
// Create theme with media queries
const theme = {
  media: {
    sm: '(max-width: 600px)'
  }
}

<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Box hide='sm' /> // @media (max-width: 600px) { display: 'none' }
</ThemeProvider>
```

### createRule

```js
import { createRule } from 'pss'
```

Create style from value. Must be used with [createStyles][154].

Related: [rule][157].

#### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][190]** 
    -   `options.cssProp`  
    -   `options.getStyle`   (optional, default `wrap(cssProp)`)
    -   `options.getValue`   (optional, default `identity`)

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { createRule, spaceValue } from 'pss'

const Box = styled.div(pss({
  gap: createRule({
    getStyle: (val) => ({ margin: val, padding: val }),
    getValue: spaceValue()
  })
}))
```

```js
// Add theme to ThemeProvider
<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Box gap={1} /> // â†’ margin: 8px; padding: 8px;
</ThemeProvider>
```

### variant

Create `variant` from styles defined directly in `theme`.
Inspired by [`styled-system`][205].

Related: [textStyle][20], [boxStyle][14], [rule][157], [themeValue][174].

#### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][190]** 
    -   `options.prop` **[String][203]**  (optional, default `'variant'`)
    -   `options.keyword` **[String][203]**  (optional, default `'auto'`)
    -   `options.themeKey`  
    -   `options.transformValue`  
    -   `options.scale`  
    -   `options.getter`  

#### Examples

```js
import { variant } from 'pss'

const variant = variant({
  themeKey: 'textStyle'
})

const Text = styled.p`
  ${variant}
`
```

```js
const theme = {
  textStyle: {
    default: {
      fontSize: '16px',
      lineHeight: 1.2,
      fontWeight: normal,
      fontFamily: 'system-ui'
    },
    heading: {
      fontSize: '2rem',
      lineHeight: 1.2,
      fontWeight: 'bold',
      fontFamily: 'system-ui'
    }
  }
}

<Text variant='default' /> // â†’ `theme.textStyle.default`
<Text variant='heading' /> // â†’ `theme.textStyle.heading`
```

```js
const themeWithDefault = {
  default: {
     textStyle: 'default',
  },
  ...theme,
}

<Text variant='auto' /> // â†’ `theme.textStyle.default`
```

### style

```js
import { style } from 'pss'
```

Create style for single prop.
Combines [createStyles][154] and [createRule][180] in single function.
Inspired by [`styled-system`][205].

#### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][190]** 
    -   `options.cssProp`  
    -   `options.themeKey`  
    -   `options.transformValue`  
    -   `options.scale`  
    -   `options.getter`  
    -   `options.prop`   (optional, default `cssProp`)
    -   `options.getValue`   (optional, default `themeKey?themeValue({themeKey,transformValue,scale,getter}):undefined`)

#### Examples

```js
import pss, { style } from 'pss'

const opacity = style({
  cssProp: 'opacity'
})

const Box = styled.div`
  ${opacity}
`
```

```js
<Box opacity={0.5} /> // â†’ opacity: 0.5
```
